original_title: 鬼平犯科帳スペシャル 雨引の文五郎
overview: Heizo "The Demon" deals with an arson thief gang known as "Bungoro" the fire thief who leaves a calling card as evidence. As a street notice, showing the thief of Ohno shop, but it is not Bungoro, it's the quick work of a solo member. Heizo Hasegawa with his hands full may have caught a break, it may be a falling out among the thieves.
title: Onihei Crime Files: Bungoro Amabiki
